title: Karun Chandhok: 'Cool-headed Piastri is favourite for the title'
summary: We’ve had four different winners across the first five races – including the sprint in China – but as I write this on the flight home from Bahrain, I wonder…

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current driver for McLaren that has been highlighted as a title favorite?
How many different race winners have there been in the first five races of the season?
Which event is mentioned as having a winner that contributes to the total count of different winners?
